snippet: Mrs. Clinton sent an unmistakable message to Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. and their fellow Democrats that she is up for a fight.
abstract: Hillary Rodham Clinton's confident performance in first Democratic presidential debate has allayed skeptics' doubts about her candidacy and dampened prospects for run by Vice Pres Joe Biden; prior calls for Biden to enter race have been based to large extent on assumption that Clinton would falter, opening space to be filled by vice president.

byline.contributor: Nick Corasaniti contributed reporting from Las Vegas, and Alan Rappeport from New York.

lead_paragraph: Mrs. Clinton sent an unmistakable message to Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. and their fellow Democrats that she is up for a fight.

headline.main: In Debate, Hillary Clinton Sent a Message to Doubters
headline.print_headline: In Debate, Clinton Sent a Message to Doubters
